name: corny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of jokes, films, stories, etc.) showing no new ideas or too often repeated, and therefore not funny or interesting: corny jokes I couldn't watch the whole movie - it was just too corny.

Add to word list
Add to word list
emotional and obvious from having been used too often: It sounds corny, but when I get to the beach I feel like a kid again.
